auth.passwordReset: Your password has been reset successfully
auth.invalidResetLinkDescription: Invalid reset link. Request a new link via the 'Forgot password' page.
auth.redirectingToLogin: You will be redirected to the login page...
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

hero.title: Tesoro CRM for Real Estate
hero.subtitle: The perfect tool for managing your properties in the Spanish real estate market

feeds.title: XML Feed Management
feeds.description: Import and manage XML property feeds from major real estate portals

customers.title: Customer Management
customers.description: Organize your customers and their property preferences efficiently

selections.title: Custom Selections

share.title: Easy Sharing

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Available in Spanish, English, German, French, Dutch, Russian and Swedish

realtime.title: Real-time Updates
realtime.description: Keep your feeds up to date with automatic synchronization

languages.title: We Speak Your Language
languages.subtitle: Tesoro CRM is available in the most commonly used languages in the Spanish real estate market

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of real estate agents who already trust Tesoro CRM

team.title: Team
team.memberRole: Member - can manage feeds and customers
team.adminRole: Admin - can also manage team members
team.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation to {email}?
team.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the team?

invite.title: Accept invitation
invite.invitedBy: {name} has invited you to join {organization} as {role}.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your central overview of Tesoro CRM.

sections.title: Statistics
sections.content: See at a glance how many feeds, customers, properties and selections you have in the system.

sections.title: Quick Actions
sections.content: Create new feeds or customers directly from the dashboard.

sections.title: Recent Activity
sections.content: Your most recently added feeds and customers are displayed here.

feeds.title: Feeds
feeds.description: Manage your XML property feeds from real estate portals.

sections.title: What is a feed?
sections.content: A feed is a connection to an XML source that contains property listings. This can be from Kyero, Resales Online, or other portals.

sections.title: Adding a feed
sections.content: Click 'New Feed' and enter a name and the XML URL. The system will automatically fetch and parse the properties.

sections.title: Check for updates
sections.content: Use 'Check' to see if the source has new data without downloading. Use 'Fetch' to download and update the properties.

sections.title: Feed status
sections.content: 'Fetched' shows when data was last downloaded. 'Checked' shows when the source was last checked for updates.

feedDetail.title: Feed Details
feedDetail.description: View and manage properties from this feed.

sections.title: Property list
sections.content: Here you see all properties from this feed with basic information like reference, type, location, and price.

sections.title: Refresh feed
sections.content: Click 'Refresh' to download the latest data from the XML source.

sections.title: Property selection
sections.content: Select properties here to later assign them to customers.

customers.title: Customers
customers.description: Manage your customers and their property selections.

sections.title: Customer overview
sections.content: See all your customers with their name, email, and number of selected properties.

sections.title: Adding a customer
sections.content: Click 'New Customer' and enter a name and optionally an email address.

sections.title: Customer feed URL
sections.content: Each customer gets a unique URL to view their selected properties. Share this link via email or message.

customerDetail.title: Customer Details
customerDetail.description: Manage property selections for this customer.

sections.title: Selecting properties
sections.content: Choose a feed and select the properties you want to show to this customer. Use the checkboxes to select.

sections.title: Filtering
sections.content: Use the filters to quickly find properties by type, location, bedrooms, or price range.

sections.title: Sharing
sections.content: Copy the unique customer URL or send it directly via email with the 'Share' button.

sections.title: Table/Card view
sections.content: Switch between table view for a quick overview or card view with images.

analyzer.title: Feed Analyzer
analyzer.description: Gain insights into your property portfolio with visual statistics.

sections.title: Selecting a feed
sections.content: Choose a feed from the dropdown to analyze its properties.

sections.title: Key figures
sections.content: See total value, average price, median price, and price per m² at a glance.

sections.title: Charts
sections.content: Interactive charts show distribution by price, type, bedrooms, location, and more.

sections.title: Drill-down
sections.content: Click on a chart segment to see the underlying properties. Perfect for detailed analysis.

team.title: Team
team.description: Manage your organization and team members.

sections.title: Organization
sections.content: Your organization name is visible to team members. Admins and owners can change this.

sections.title: Team members
sections.content: See all members with their role: Owner (full access), Admin (can manage team), or Member (feeds & customers only).

sections.title: Inviting members
sections.content: Send invitations via email. Choose the role the new member should have.

sections.title: Managing roles
sections.content: As owner you can change member roles or remove them from the team.

profile.title: Profile
profile.displayNameHint: This name is visible to your team members
profile.languageHint: The interface language for your account
profile.emailChangeHint: A verification link will be sent to the new address

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email
verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email has been changed to {email}
